entries.journal_entry_description: Assist Imperial officers as they make preparations for celebrating Empire Day.
entries.task00_journal_entry_description: I need to speak with the Garrison Historian in the combat guild on Rori.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: I need to recover three historical data disks. I have two options. I can visit various individuals known by the historian who have copies of the disks. Or I can eliminate Rebels until I recover the disks smuggled out by the historian's traitorous assistant.
entries.task02_journal_entry_description: I need to recover three historical data disks. I have two options. I can get the first disk from a contact in the small cantina in Bestine, Tatooine. Or I can eliminate Rebels until I recover the disks smuggled out by the historian's traitorous assistant.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: I need to recover three historical data disks. I have two options. I can get the second disk from a contact in the Medical Center in Bela Vistal, Corellia. Or I can eliminate Rebels until I recover the disks smuggled out by the historian's traitorous assistant.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: I need to recover three historical data disks. I have two options. I can get the last disk from a contact in the Theater in Deeja Peak, Naboo. Or I can eliminate Rebels until I recover the disks smuggled out by the historian's traitorous assistant.
entries.task05_journal_entry_description: Return to the Garrison Historian on Rori in the Narmle Combat Guild.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: Visit the data officer at the Dathomir Science Outpost.
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: Hand deliver the disks to the commander.
entries.task10_journal_entry_description: Speak with the commander to see if he requires any other assistance.
